@DWMtweets Have looked it up: John on DWA 1-363 (2006-2015): 1612 pages. Dave Sim on Cerebus 1-300 (1977-2004): c. 6000 pages.

@anghelides @TeamEndo @bigfinish @DWMtweets Women who haven't already done Doctor Who stuff? I really like Emily Carroll's unsettling collection, Through the Woods, and Sydney Padua's amazing The Thrilling Adventures of Lovelace and Babbage.

@DWMtweets Ullo. John's is a longer run of issues, but each DWA stip was 4, 5 or 6 pages - not a whole comic book as was Cerebus. John's drawn more DW comic than anyone else, though - by some way. He's fab.
